item.title: Review of "Coherence in Natural Language (2006)"
item.description: Terminological mess The term cohesion does not figure in the index of the book. Coherence vs cohesion “cohesion” for microstructures and “coherence” for macrostructures. cohesion when talking about text and coherence when talking about discourse i.e. “semantics vs. pragmatics” Issues covered in the book in the realm of coherence structures: cognitive science natural language engineering information extraction Definitions Coherence structures ommitted: a chrestomathy of coherent vs incoherent text Reviews Coherence in natural language.
